page.title: 10Village shops and services
page.content: The shops and services available in Denby Dale were surveyed to show the number of customers.(a){Most popular: Newsagents, Bank, Post Office, Grocer, Butcher, Greengrocer, DIY, Fish and Chip shop, Electrical goods, Baker. (b){Moderately popular:}Frozen foods, Pie Hall, Garage, Hairdresser, Jeweller, Florist, Dentist, Travel Agent, Wool shop, Video shop, Public House, Building Society, Children's Boutique, Ladies' Boutique.(c){Least {popular:}Photocopier, Motor cycle shop. Denby Dale offers low level amenities resulting in the need for travel for higher levels of service. Shopping further afield requires the use of a car or the regular bus connections to the nearby towns so this is undertaken on a weekly basis for specific items not so generally or cheaply available in the village. {
